name: 执谕者：坠月之兆（Archenemy: Lunafall）
description:
ATTENTION:

This game is still under development.
Due to limited resources, we currently only support Simplified Chinese.

Introducion：


This game is a visual novel.

  • More than 400,000 words, having multiple endings.
  • An adventure story including "religion", "magic", "modern campus", "suspense", "love" and other elements.
  • A large number of original CG elaborately prepare, totaling more than 40 sets, about 200 pieces.
  • Fully voice of three major female roles.
